short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Kill the back and forth between your inbox and calendar

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Finding windows to book time shouldn't feel annoying. Instantly find and paste your availability without ever leaving your inbox using the Availa extension.
